name: Math Class
description:
As my submission to "KootJam", where the theme was "Dream", you play as a boring math teacher and you have to wake students from sleeping in the class by throwing chalk at them.

Controls are easy; you aim using the mouse and shoot using the left click. The longer you hold the left click the further the chalk travels.

This is only a Game Jam submission. I have no intention of developing this any further, just something I made for giggles across two hours spread through two weeks because life and baby stuff.
